nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 4pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 74. Northeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 10am and 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 89, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
